ModMetaData.name: MetaGenes
ModMetaData.author: Xenthur
ModMetaData.description: Genes that mess around with genes! This mod adds various Xenotype-altering genes. Some genes add random genes on spawn, or even entire Xenotypes, letting you populate your world with hybrids such as Pigskin Hussars or Impid Highmates. Others let a pawn copy a Xenotype onto themself, become resistant to gene loss, or even disable their Xenogerm altogether.
